column1: Cyber Security, Privacy and Trust MSc
column5: Programme Description Our societies are critically dependent on computer software. Electronic systems are everywhere, and governments, financial and transport organisations, or telecommunication companies all possess and manage huge amounts of sensitive information concerning all of our everyday activities.With the emergence of new systems and services, every aspect of our life is relying on / is recorded by some computerised system, such as:
